title: Collaborative Science Knowledge Management and Learning Design Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic science theories and experience with online collaboration tools
context.additional_context: A science-field job-linked program conducted in a smartphone-based, limited-technology environment.

learning_goals: Learners can construct a knowledge ontology model in the science domain with 80% accuracy using collaboration tools.
Learners develop at least three shareable science experiment protocols with team members through self-directed learning design.
Learners apply three or more collaboration-based learning design strategies in mobile environments to propose knowledge management solutions.

resources: Smartphone-compatible collaboration platforms (Google Workspace, Notion, etc.)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
